attributes.action: review and compensate all those whos are affected by the missing data disc's from hmrc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am writing to the prime minister to highlight the fact that even at this moment in time the has been no illegal activity from the missing data disc's from H.M.R.C, and that it has now come to light that there are another six disc's missing that all clients affected by the shear incompetence of the H.M.R.C and that as such these are breaches of data protection act 1984 and the official secrets act to which all government employee's are legally constituted by have been breached and there for all clients affected are legally entitled to start legal prosecution to seek compensation for the undue stress and the fact that there has been no resolution to the matter as it stands, therefore should you feel the same as me and feel that some compensation be paid for the incompetence by H.M.R.C i would ask you to sign this petition that will submitted to the prime minister along with a citation for legal action should the government decide to hide behind closed doors about this matter any longer

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
